properties.name: volume
properties.description: Set the initial volume of the video playback, where 0.0 is 0% volume and 1.0 is 100%.For example: for a volume of 30% set the value to 0.3.

properties.name: scalingMode
properties.description: There are to options for the scaling mode. SCALE_TO_FIT which is default and SCALE_TO_FIT_WITH_CROPPING.These strings are the only ones which can be passed as option.
